summary.en: Visual editor that lets you draw generative gradients and exports production-ready CSS snippets.
summary.zh: 一个可以绘制生成式渐变并导出生产级 CSS 代码的可视化编辑器。

description.en: FlowField is a design tool focused on gradients and organic textures. Drag control points, mix multi-layer noise, and instantly copy the CSS. Built to streamline collaboration between designers and front-end engineers.
description.zh: FlowField 是一个专注于渐变与有机纹理的设计工具。拖拽控制点、混合多层噪声，即可实时预览并复制 CSS 代码，帮助设计师与前端更顺畅协作。

summary.en: Micro product for deep work sessions with ambient soundscapes and weekly reflection prompts.
summary.zh: 帮助深度工作的小产品，提供氛围声场与每周复盘提示。

description.en: A mindful pomodoro companion. Schedule focus blocks, pick a curated ambient track, and review highlights after each sprint. Syncs with LocalStorage so it works perfectly offline.
description.zh: 一款注重仪式感的番茄钟助手。规划专注时段、选择氛围音轨，并在每次冲刺后做简短复盘。支持离线使用并自动保存设置。

summary.en: A doodle-powered platformer where every stroke alters the physics of the world.
summary.zh: 一款由涂鸦驱动的平台解谜游戏，你的每一笔都会改变世界的物理状态。

description.en: Draw springs, portals, and companions to solve whimsical puzzles. Optimised for mobile browsers with buttery 60fps rendering and dynamic difficulty curves.
description.zh: 绘制弹簧、传送门与小伙伴来解决奇妙的谜题。针对移动端浏览器优化，保持流畅的 60fps，并根据玩家行为动态调整难度。

summary.en: Meditative music toy that lets you layer synth pads and share generative sound postcards.
summary.zh: 一个冥想系音乐玩具，叠加合成器音色并生成可分享的声音明信片。

description.en: Designed for relaxation, Echoes of Aurora turns gestures into shimmering melodies. Rendered with Web Audio API and features a shader-powered aurora visualiser.
description.zh: 为放松而生的声音玩具，将轻触与滑动转化为闪烁旋律。基于 Web Audio API，并使用 Shader 实现极光视觉效果。
